def_en: Fireworks are small objects that are lit to entertain people on special occasions. They contain chemicals and burn brightly or attractively, often with a loud noise, when you light them.
You use fireworks to refer to an occasion on which fireworks are lit to entertain people.

def_cn: 精彩难忘的演出(或作品)
def_en: An exciting and impressive performance or piece of writing can be referred to as fireworks .
